description: News about Bank of England, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Bank of England
title_page: Bank of England - The New York Times
maintext:
U.K. Markets Rise as New Chancellor Axes Truss’s Tax and Spending Plans
Jeremy Hunt, Britain’s new top finance official, said he was scrapping policies that had spurred turmoil in the markets. But the economy still faces stubborn problems.
